definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="block_add"><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:CavePlantMiddleUnlit</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><value name="TIMES"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="random_integer"><value name="upper_bound"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="spawn_gem"><field name="despawn">TRUE</field><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:GlowBerries</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="pickUpDelay"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="soundcategory">neutral</field><field name="sound">item.sweet_berries.pick_from_bush</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
